divs: Sighting Detailsreceive sms true my phone i have cousin in suriname now for 9 month. i have receive too message in two weeks time that he saw UFO strange light he could not take film of it because he borrow his camera to a friend. First time his neighbor man ask him if that was and airplane and he say no because of the strange ligh. the neighbor man told my soucin that previous monht he saw it also. now one week later my grand mother past a way my relatif went to suriname. now my aunt her husband wim ben velsen all saw the ufo as witness what my cousin mention to mee before. I told he should get his camera back to take picture if possible and film of it. if UFO should have base our landing then it is suriname almost80% precent is forest with no road to go. you guys should check it out.
